Uncertain. Various explanations include:

• A pictogram ( 象形 ) of waterweed spread flat on the surface of water. Original form of 苹 ( OC *beŋ , “duckweed”). (Lawrence J. Howell)
• Pictogram ( 象形 ) of a balance scale. ( Karlgren , 1973)
